column1: '''Thomas Mastakouris''' (Greek: Θωμάς Μαστακούρης) is a Greek author
column2: writer and translator. His field of expertise have been fantasy
column3: horror and science fiction. Outside of the field of literature
column4: he has written (occasionally as a collaborator) on topics such as conspiracy theories

column1: He has translated several books by [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] as well as books related to him or [[Middle-earth]]. He has also authored at least one book concerning Tolkien's [[legendarium]].
He is a member of [[Greek Tolkien Society]].
